name: 4-nin Uchi Mahjong
summary: 4-nin Uchi Mahjong is a Family Computer video game about mahjong. It was only released in Japan using the Japanese language and it was Nintendo's second mahjong game ever made.

name: 4NR
summary: 4NR is a discovery-based puzzle platformer. The player chooses one of two paths; digging down into the depths in pursuit of coins, or climbing upwards, staying ahead of the relentless pursuit of Sheol. The game features Game Boy-inspired 4 colour LCD graphics and an atmospheric chiptune soundtrack.

name: 4-nin Shogi
summary:
4-nin Shogi is a four-person variant of shogi (Japanese chess). It may be played with a dedicated yonin shogi set or with two sets of standard shogi pieces, and is played on a standard sized shogi board.
The objective of the game is to capture your opponentsâ€™ kings as an individual or with the option of teaming up with one or two fellow players. Fast matches are common.
